Translations.Text: wama anzalna ʿala qawmihi min baʿdihi min jundin mina l-samai wama kunna munzilina
in kanat illa sayhatan wahidatan fa-idha hum khamiduna
yahasratan ʿala l-ʿibadi ma yatihim min rasulin illa kanu bihi yastahziuna
alam yaraw kam ahlakna qablahum mina l-quruni annahum ilayhim la yarjiʿuna
wa-in kullun lamma jamiʿun ladayna muh'daruna
waayatun lahumu l-ardu l-maytatu ahyaynaha wa-akhrajna min'ha habban famin'hu yakuluna
wajaʿalna fiha jannatin min nakhilin wa-aʿnabin wafajjarna fiha mina l-ʿuyuni
liyakulu min thamarihi wama ʿamilathu aydihim afala yashkuruna
sub'hana alladhi khalaqa l-azwaja kullaha mimma tunbitu l-ardu wamin anfusihim wamimma la yaʿlamuna
waayatun lahumu al-laylu naslakhu min'hu l-nahara fa-idha hum muz'limuna
wal-shamsu tajri limus'taqarrin laha dhalika taqdiru l-ʿazizi l-ʿalimi
wal-qamara qaddarnahu manazila hatta ʿada kal-ʿur'juni l-qadimi
la l-shamsu yanbaghi laha an tud'rika l-qamara wala al-laylu sabiqu l-nahari wakullun fi falakin yasbahuna
waayatun lahum anna hamalna dhurriyyatahum fi l-ful'ki l-mashhuni
wakhalaqna lahum min mith'lihi ma yarkabuna
wa-in nasha nugh'riq'hum fala sarikha lahum wala hum yunqadhuna
illa rahmatan minna wamataʿan ila hinin
wa-idha qila lahumu ittaqu ma bayna aydikum wama khalfakum laʿallakum tur'hamuna
wama tatihim min ayatin min ayati rabbihim illa kanu ʿanha muʿ'ridina
wa-idha qila lahum anfiqu mimma razaqakumu l-lahu qala alladhina kafaru lilladhina amanu anut'ʿimu man law yashau l-lahu atʿamahu in antum illa fi dalalin mubinin
wayaquluna mata hadha l-waʿdu in kuntum sadiqina
ma yanzuruna illa sayhatan wahidatan takhudhuhum wahum yakhissimuna
fala yastatiʿuna tawsiyatan wala ila ahlihim yarjiʿuna
wanufikha fi l-suri fa-idha hum mina l-ajdathi ila rabbihim yansiluna
qalu yawaylana man baʿathana min marqadina hadha ma waʿada l-rahmanu wasadaqa l-mur'saluna
in kanat illa sayhatan wahidatan fa-idha hum jamiʿun ladayna muh'daruna
fal-yawma la tuz'lamu nafsun shayan wala tuj'zawna illa ma kuntum taʿmaluna
inna ashaba l-janati l-yawma fi shughulin fakihuna
hum wa-azwajuhum fi zilalin ʿala l-araiki muttakiuna
lahum fiha fakihatun walahum ma yaddaʿuna
salamun qawlan min rabbin rahimin
wa-im'tazu l-yawma ayyuha l-muj'rimuna
